item.title: 退休后租房还是买房更好？
item.description: 婴儿潮一代历来倾向于拥有房产。但随着英国许多地区房价增长停滞，越来越多的人选择释放资本转而租房。【原文：The Boomer generation has traditionally leant towards property ownership. But with price growth stagnant in many parts of the UK, more are opting to free up capital and rent】

item.title: 邮件失误曝光900亿美元俄罗斯石油走私集团
item.description: 使用同一服务器的企业网络中，包含一个鲜为人知的集团，该集团已成为该国最大的石油出口商。【原文：Apparent network of companies using same server includes little-known group that has become country’s largest oil exporter】

item.title: 基金经理薪酬差距持续存在
item.description: 即便在竞争激烈、以绩效为导向的行业中，女性和少数族裔管理者仍面临薪酬较低且更易被解雇的困境。【原文：Even in a competitive, performance-driven industry, female and minority managers are paid less and are more likely to be fired】
